overview: Andrea has been working long hours in hopes that an important merger at the law firm will catapult her to partner. Unfortunately, her dedication backfires when her neglected girlfriend finds comfort in bed with someone else. So when her boss decides to make his degenerate son a partner instead, Andrea suffers a complete meltdown. Her best friend Justin suggests a weekend in the country, she sees it as a chance to clear her mind. He sees it as a chance to finally tell her that he wants to be more than friends. At the nudging of his mother, his crazy brother and his horny lady friend, Justin makes his move. Will Andrea reject his advances or decide that maybe they are perfect partnersâ€¦?
title: The Perfect Partner
